program.name: gettext
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix5*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" CXX=xlC CXXFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl" ;; *-aix4*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl"
# We do not have stpcpy() export ac_cv_func_stpcpy=no ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -std -msym -readonly_strings" CXX=cxx CXXFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="+O2 -AA -z +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-hpux10*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
# Don't use getline in libc or xgettext will core dump export ac_cv_func_getline=no ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-LANG:std -Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT_INC} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+-I${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_INC}}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT_LIB} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+-L${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --with-included-gettext \ --datadir=${_datadir} --libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

item.para: Add support for AIX 4.3.3. While stpcpy() is in libc, the prototype is not available unless you -D_LINUX_SOURCE_COMPAT. Because it was introduced in ML7, we refrain for backwards compatibility.
Add support for AIX 5.2 by importing better stdbool.m4 test from 0.13.1
